[[inst_hl_bfi]]
==== HL.BFI

*Syntax:* hl.bfi SrcL, SrcR, M, N, ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Bit Field Insert: inserts a bit field from source into destination.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_bfi.svg[HL.BFI encoding,width=800]

*Group:* RSV/DEFAULT
